description:
Lloyd rescues Alka from Eug`s trap and rushes back to Azami. Eug, Sou and Shoma put their plan in motion, but Marie, Riho, Selen and the others take a stand to resist them.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Suppose a Kid from the Last Dungeon Boonies Got Used to Life in a Starter Town?
Tatoeba Last Dungeon Mae no Mura no Shounen ga Joban no Machi de Kurasu to Konna Fuu ni Naru yo nette Tenkai
たとえばラストダンジョン前の村の少年が序盤の街で暮らすとこんな風になるよねって展開
